mapper.insert: insert into pf_payment(member_no, product_name, price, apply_posting, method, comment, pay_date, start_date, end_date) values (#{memberNumber}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{jobPostingTitle}, #{method}, #{comment}, #{payDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select pay_no, member_no, product_name, price, apply_posting, method, comment, pay_date, start_date, end_date from pf_payment p where member_no=#{userNumber} order by pay_no desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
